General.Name: Miton UK MicroCap Trust PLC
General.Description: Miton UK MicroCap Trust plc is a closed-ended equity mutual fund launched and managed by Miton Trust Managers Limited. The fund invests in the public equity markets of the United Kingdom. It seeks to invest in stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. The fund primarily invests in stocks of micro-cap companies having market capitalizations of less than £150 million. Miton UK MicroCap Trust plc was formed on March 26, 2015 and is domiciled in the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Eastgate Court, Guildford, United Kingdom, GU1 3DE
